effect_group.help: NPC:Count Non Hirable NPCs nearby

triggered_effect.help: sync range with buffNPCincPlayerNonHireableNPCsNearby answer. even if not hired, they are helpful. This count prevents the player from creating a concentrated army.

effect_group.help: RangedNPClimit: NPC control buff

RangedNPClimit: sets the var that NPCs will use to self leave the party. More than one NPC follower is only allowed when the player UNequips a ranged weapon. This is for the melee build. Obs.: There is no limit for melee NPCs following the player at any time.
RangedNPClimit: when the player equips a ranged weapon, the ranged NPC follow limit is always 1. If the player is using a ranged weapon, (s)he can only have one ranged NPC follower.

triggered_effect.help: force limit 1 at any charisma lvl
